title: Did Democrats’ score an own-goal with voting rights? Susan Page & Kasie Hunt
description: Washington bureau chief for USA TODAY and the author of Madam Speaker: Nancy Pelosi and the Lessons of Power, Susan Page, and NBC News Capitol Hill correspondent and the host of Way Too Early on MSNBC, Kasie Hunt, join Chuck to talk about Democrats’ strategy in advancing their agenda.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Washington bureau chief for USA TODAY and the author of Madam Speaker: Nancy Pelosi and the Lessons of Power, Susan Page, and NBC News Capitol Hill correspondent and the host of Way Too Early on MSNBC, Kasie Hunt, join Chuck to talk about Democrats’ strategy in advancing their agenda.

itunes:summary: Susan Page & Kasie Hunt talk about the politics inside the Democratic caucus.
